author: @gaugogoi
text: It is always advised not to leave job untill you  get the next offer in hand , well this is an ideal scenario. However, the journey is not also a 'bed of roses' one must admit that. One should devote enormous time and effort with consistence. One very important thing also is getting a DS job might be somewhat easy compared to sustaining , reason being the DS tasks are no more traditional DS anymore it's now much more robust and requires many skills to accomplish. Probably why people like Krish Naik is around who proves 'Yes, it's difficult but doable'. Thanks Krish for everything 👍
